relationships.entity_2: the standard book of spells, grade three
relationships.description: Harry needs to buy The Standard Book of Spells, Grade Three from Flourish and Blotts.
Harry visited Flourish and Blotts to buy his new books.
After buying his new books, Harry went to The Leaky Cauldron.
Harry saw something in Magnolia Crescent that made him panic.
Harry lives in Diagon Alley, as evidenced by the sound of buses and crowd below his room.
